author: Mark Gutman/Daily News
title: Lake Effect Snow over Genesee County | Multimedia | thelcn.com
text: Heavy lake effect snow over Genesee County this morning. This was the scene on Rt. 63 in East Bethany where it was near white out conditions towards Pavilion.
